lexUnit.name: disarm.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: take a weapon or weapons away from.

sentence.text: Since the 1975 -1990 civil war , car bombings have all but disappeared as the government has restored authority across much of the country and disarmed Muslim and Christian militias .
